verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will praise (ladies repeat etc.)
You, oh Lord
With all my heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will tell
Of Your wonders
I'll be glad and exult in You
(Together) I'll be glad and exult in You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will sing praise to Your Name Oh Most High
I will sing praise to Your Name
(repeat)
